archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.3.12c: c) notifying relevant authorities and data subjects of a data privacy breach (e.g. as required by data breach notification laws, such as the California Security Breach Notification Law (SB 1386) or the EU Directive on Privacy and Electronic Communications 2009).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
